news.title: Google was at risk of losing its dominance — until it promoted this AI executive
news.description: Josh Woodward, a 16-year Google veteran, is tasked with running the Gemini app and going head-to-head with OpenAI in the booming generative AI market.

news.title: Epstein files released by DOJ
news.description: President Donald Trump signed the Epstein Files Transparency Act in November.

news.title: Abel takes over for Buffett in less than two weeks. Wall Street has some advice for new Berkshire CEO
news.description: With Warren Buffett's planned departure as Berkshire Hathaway's CEO less than two weeks away, some on Wall Street have advice for incoming CEO Greg Abel.
